feed.title: Track Awesome Umbraco Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A curated list of awesome Umbraco packages, resources and tools

entry.title: Awesome Umbraco Updates on Aug 04, 2022
entry.content:
Backoffice extensions / Form Builders

  • Umbraco Forms* - A package to easily add customisable forms to your website. (Developed by Umbraco HQ)

Backoffice extensions / Property Editors

  • Meganav - A flexible, draggable link picker for constructing site navigation menus, big or small.

Backoffice extensions / SEO Tools

  • SEO Checker* - find common SEO issues in your Umbraco website.
  • SeoToolkit - Package that provides SEO features like meta fields, redirects, etc.

Developer tools / SEO Tools

  • Konstrukt* - Backoffice UI builder through code.

entry.title: Awesome Umbraco Updates on Jan 24, 2022
entry.content:
Developer tools / SEO Tools

  • DateFolders - Creates Datefolders (year/month(/day)) for the specified doctype for Umbraco
  • AlphabetFolders - Creates AlphabetFolders for the specified doctype for Umbraco

entry.title: Awesome Umbraco Updates on Dec 03, 2021
entry.content:
Backoffice extensions

  • Skybrud.Umbraco.Redirects - Redirects manager for Umbraco.
  • SimpleRedirects - Redirects manager for Umbraco.
  • Newsletter Studio* - Responsive email editor to create emails for all clients.
  • Backoffice Themes - Allows choosing your own themes for in the backoffice.

Developer tools / SEO Tools

  • Diplo God Mode - Exposes a lot of information for developers.

Website Utilities / Deployment

  • Full Text Search - Fast and easy way to setup search for your website.

entry.title: Awesome Umbraco Updates on Nov 29, 2021
entry.content:
Backoffice extensions

  • Page Not Found Manager - Manage your sites 404 page(s) from Umbraco.

Starter Kits / Deployment

  • Clean Starter Kit - Clean and simple website to get started with

entry.title: Awesome Umbraco Updates on Oct 17, 2020
entry.content:
Official

  • CodeGarden Conference

Community

  • 24 Days In Umbraco - yearly advent calendar for Umbraco content.
  • Candid Contributions - a fortnightly podcast discussing all things Umbraco and open source.
  • Official YouTube Channel - the Umbraco community YouTube channel.

Backoffice extensions

  • Contentment - A handy collection of Umbraco components developed for use in your Umbraco projects.

entry.title: Awesome Umbraco Updates on Oct 06, 2020
entry.content:
eCommerce & CRM / Deployment

  • Vendr* - eCommerce built on top of Umbraco.

entry.title: Awesome Umbraco Updates on Jan 31, 2019
entry.content:
Backoffice extensions

  • Translation Manager* - lets you handle all of the steps of the translation process from within Umbraco.

entry.title: Awesome Umbraco Updates on Jan 28, 2019
entry.content:
Developer tools / Deployment

  • Deploy Contrib (‚≠ê12) - Offers value-connectors for the most popular Umbraco community packages. To allow Umbraco Cloud deploy to transfer content/property-data to a target environment. (Maintained by Umbraco HQ) Umbraco Cloud only

entry.title: Awesome Umbraco Updates on Jan 15, 2019
entry.content:
Official

  • Download
  • Forum
  • Official YouTube Channel - tutorials and other helpful videos about Umbraco products.

Community

  • #h5yr - High Five, You Rock!
  • Blog Posts - blog posts by members of the Umbraco community and Umbraco HQ.
  • Skrift - a monthly magazine for sharing knowledge in the Umbraco community.
  • umbraCoffee - a weekly YouTube series discussing recent Umbraco news.

Developer tools / SEO Tools

  • uSync - Syncing tool for reading and writing the database elements to disk.

entry.title: Awesome Umbraco Updates on Oct 29, 2018
entry.content:
Official

  • Umbraco website
  • Documentation
  • Meetups

Backoffice extensions

  • Plumber - adds a heap of useful bits and pieces to Umbraco, to allow multi-staged workflow approval.

Developer tools / SEO Tools

  • CMSImport* - import content or members from any datasource into Umbraco.

entry.title: Awesome Umbraco Updates on Aug 23, 2017
entry.content:
Backoffice extensions / Property Editors

  • uEditorNotes - Provides a way to display instructional messages for content editors, at the point of content entry.
